mapper.insert: insert into Communities( owner_id, place_id, name, summary_image_url, summary_message, summary_pr, description, profile_image_url, member_count, visibility, status) values ( #{ownerId}, #{placeId}, #{name}, #{summaryImageUrl}, #{summaryMessage}, #{summaryPr}, #{description}, #{profileImageUrl}, 1, #{visibility}, 1 )
insert into CommunityMembers( community_id, user_id, role_id, status, fav_flg) values ( #{community_id}, #{user_id}, #{role_id}, #{status}, #{fav} )
mapper.select: select id, name, summary_image_url as summaryImageUrl , summary_message as summaryMessage, summary_pr as summaryPr from Communities

select id, name, summary_image_url as summaryImageUrl , summary_message as summaryMessage, summary_pr as summaryPr from Communities where name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or summary_message LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or description LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or summary_pr LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
select c.id as communityId, c.name as communityName from Communities AS c JOIN CommunityMembers AS cm ON c.id = cm.community_id where cm.user_id = #{my_id}

select id, owner_id as ownerId, place_id as placeId, name, summary_image_url as summaryImageUrl , summary_message as summaryMessage, summary_pr as summaryPr, description, member_count as memberCount, visibility as visibility from Communities as c where c.id = #{community_id}
